DOC.brief_summary: By an invasive technique keratin 14 has been identified as a prognostic factor in bladder cancer. This study aims to analyze whether through a non-invasive technique keratin 14 can be used as a diagnostic and prognostic marker for this cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Detection of K14 in Bladder Cancer With a Non Invasive Technique
DOC.criteria: Bladder cancer Inability to sign the informed consent
